title: White cranes return to Momoge wetland
text:
More than 1,500 white cranes have arrived at Momoge National Nature Reserve in Zhenlai town, Northeast China's Jilin province. [Photo by Zhao Lengbing for chinadaily.com.cn]

More than 1,500 white cranes have recently arrived at Momoge National Nature Reserve in Zhenlai town, Northeast China's Jilin province.

Located at the border of Jilin and Heilongjiang provinces and the Inner Mongolia autonomous region, Momoge has rich natural resources and been dubbed China's Hometown for White Cranes.

In recent years, Momoge has been making every effort to improve and restore the natural environment, providing an ideal place for migratory birds to rest during their annual migration.
description: More than 1,500 white cranes have recently arrived at Momoge National Nature Reserve in Zhenlai town, Northeast China's Jilin province.
